summary: SweetSteps app using Internet Identity authentication; plan to add in-app Logout and Delete Account flows for testing/resetting user state.
architectural_notes: Internet Identity anchor cannot be deleted from within the app; Logout should clear app-local auth/session state only.
Delete Account should delete the user’s backend/canister record; II anchor remains but app treats next login as new user.

existing_features.title: Add a global, in-app Logout action in SweetSteps that clears the app’s authenticated session state and returns the user to the landing or login screen.
Add an in-app Delete Account action in SweetSteps that deletes the user’s backend record and then logs them out and resets all local SweetSteps state.
Ensure the Logout and Delete Account actions are accessible from the main authenticated experience (at minimum on the primary authenticated pages) and behave consistently across routes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add in-app Logout button to clear SweetSteps auth/local session state and return user to landing/login
Add in-app Delete Account button to remove the user record from the backend so next login is treated as a new user
Add a backend endpoint that deletes the currently authenticated user’s stored data in the canister so that the next Internet Identity login is treated as a new user by SweetSteps.
